about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey through a world of mind-bending puzzles and intricate challenges in this platform puzzle game. Delve into a realm where the laws of physics are yours to command, allowing you to manipulate objects and trigger mechanisms with precision and finesse. Unleash your creativity as you navigate through a series of physics-based puzzles that will put your problem-solving skills to the test.

But that's not all - in this fantastical world, the power of elements is at your fingertips. Experiment with the unique properties of different elements to overcome obstacles and unlock new pathways. Whether it's using a wet object to conduct electricity or harnessing heat to defrost frozen barriers, the possibilities are endless.

Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world crafted in a stylized visuals that blends fantasy elements seamlessly into the gameplay. From intricate details to breathtaking landscapes, every corner of this world is a feast for the eyes.

Are you ready to embark on a journey filled with mystery, discovery, and endless possibilities? Prepare to be captivated by the charm and complexity of this platform puzzle game as you unravel its secrets and conquer its challenges. The adventure awaits - are you up for the challenge?

name: Logialand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a world where physics reign supreme, allowing you to manipulate objects and press buttons in unique ways to solve intricate puzzles. Use the power of elements to your advantage - from conducting electricity with a wet object to defrosting frozen doors with heat.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Indonesian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
